Max Uint32
===

> Maximum unsigned 32-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var UINT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint32-max' );
```

#### UINT32_MAX

Maximum unsigned 32-bit `integer`. 

``` javascript
UINT32_MAX === (Math.pow(2,32) - 1);
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <notes> -->
## Notes

- `UINT32_MAX` is the maximum `array` length.

<!-- </notes> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var UINT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint32-max' );

console.log( UINT32_MAX );
// returns 4294967295
```

<!-- </examples -->
